item.title: The Great Jahy's Wakame Konbu Debuts New Series on February 12
item.content:encoded: This year's 10th issue of Shueisha's Young Jump magazine announced on Thursday that Wakame Konbu will launch the Watashi no Koto Suki Janakatta ka yo!?...

item.title: Trigun Stargaze ‒ Episode 5
item.content:encoded: Only an action sci-fi as nutty as <i>Trigun</i> can equip one of its most dangerous antagonists with a murder-saxophone, and somehow make it work.

item.title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End Season 2 ‒ Episode 4
item.content:encoded: The date, as constructed, was a failure—but in that failure, it becomes a success.

item.title: Crunchyroll Manga Adds 30 New Titles from J-Novel Club
item.content:encoded: <cite>Demon Lord, Retry!</cite>, <cite>To Another World... with Land Mines!</cite>, more added to app

item.title: Abrams ComicArts' Kana Licenses Inio Asano's Before Dawn and The End Of The World Manga
item.content:encoded: Asano's short story collection launches in English in November

item.title: Gnosia ‒ Episodes 16-17
item.content:encoded: I am frustrated because I feel like I am cooking my brain to reckon with <i>Gnosia</i>'s convoluted web of a narrative without getting anything but more teases in return.

item.title: Maki Enjōji Launches New Series in March
item.content:encoded: <cite>Suki no Hitotsu mo Ienai Kuse ni</cite> debuts on March 6

item.title: Dead Account ‒ Episode 5
item.content:encoded: Somehow, by some unholy anti-miracle, this anime's laughably bad animation and art style have stunned me again.

item.title: Osamu Tezuka's Phoenix Manga Gets Live Manga Performance at MoN Takanawa Museum
item.content:encoded: Performance based on <cite>Phoenix: Future Arc</cite> runs from April 22-May 16 at new museum

item.title: Mario Tennis Fever Game Unveils Opening Cinematic Video
item.content:encoded: Game launches for Switch 2 on Thursday

item.title: Fire Force Season 3 ‒ Episode 17
item.content:encoded: Any episode that gives Ogun more screen time to kick ass and charm the pants off the audience is bound to be a good one.

item.title: Demon Slayer: The Hinokami Chronicles 2 Game Adds Infinity Castle Tanjiro DLC on February 13
item.content:encoded: Infinity Castle Akaza launched on December 19

item.title: Mamoru Hosoda's Scarlet Anime Film Earns US$260,000 in United States
item.content:encoded: Live-action <cite>Return to Silent Hill</cite> film earns approximately US$5,544,971 after its 3rd weekend

item.title: Roll Over and Die ‒ Episode 5
item.content:encoded: This is precisely what I want out of their relationship—two “cursed” women doing the difficult work of undoing the harm others inflicted onto them.

item.title: Sentenced to Be a Hero ‒ Episode 5
item.content:encoded: Sure, all the fundamentals are there, but they aren’t used in a terribly effective or creative manner.

item.title: Naver Webtoon Launches 'Flower Scholar' Character Project With Global Merch Push
item.content:encoded: Project features characters from <i>Operation: True Love</i>, <i>My In-Laws Are Obsessed with Me</i>, <i>Can't Get Enough of You</i>, <i>Selfish Romance</i>, <i>The Fox Club</i>

item.title: A Joyful Life Webtoon Gets Short-Form Live-Action Series Adaptation
item.content:encoded: Webtoon tells healing coming-of-age story about young woman trapped in a hollow life

item.title: The Invisible Man and His Soon-to-Be Wife ‒ Episode 5
item.content:encoded: I don't think anyone ever feels comfortable being the least experienced one in a relationship.

item.title: Soredemo Kichijoji dake ga Sumitai Machi Desu ka? Manga Gets 2nd Volume After Nearly 5 Years
item.content:encoded: Manga is sequel to Hirochi Maki's <cite>Is Kichijoji the Only Place to Live?</cite> manga

item.title: The Stellar Swordmaster Webtoon Gets Mobile RPG Adaptation
item.content:encoded: Webtoon is currently available in 10 languages, has surpassed 250 million global views

item.title: Chained Soldier Season 2 ‒ Episode 5
item.content:encoded: If <i>Chained Soldier</i> is going to start cutting corners with the T&A of all things, then what are we even doing here?

item.title: The Duke's Daughter Drops Her Engagement and Facade Manga Ends
item.content:encoded: Series debuted in March 2023

item.title: Toomics Denies Sale Rumors as It Seeks New Investment
item.content:encoded: Company responds after report earlier this month stated Toomics had begun process to sell management control

item.title: Manga Plus Adds Akira Moriguchi's Stop! I'm Falling for You! Manga
item.content:encoded: Manga launched in <cite>Tonari no Young Jump</cite> in March 2025

item.title: Scheduled Down Time
item.content:encoded: Anime News Network will be offline for server upgrades from 10:00 am to 11:00 am EST on Monday, February 9th. We apologize for any inconveniences.

item.title: Kadokawa Releases 'Farewell, My Firsts,' Shino & Ren Manga in English
item.content:encoded: <cite>Farewell, My Firsts</cite> releases on February 10; <cite>Shino & Ren</cite> on February 13

item.title: The Classroom of a Black Cat and a Witch Anime Announces Ending Theme Song Artist
item.content:encoded: Spira Spica to perform 'Tune Up'

item.title: Cosmic Princess Kaguya! Anime Film Gets Theatrical Release
item.content:encoded: Film to screen for one week beginning February 20

item.title: Lady Gaga, Trevor Noah, Blackpink's Jisoo Name Their Favorite Pokémon
item.content:encoded: Charles Leclerc, Lamine Yamal, Maitreyi Ramakrishnan, Young Miko also star in Super Bowl ad

item.title: The Case Book of Arne Anime Casts Yūko Miyamura as Red Riding Hood
item.content:encoded: Phantom Thief Red Riding Hood appears in episode 7 on February 18

item.title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie Airs Super Bowl Commercial
item.content:encoded: Film opens in U.S., U.K. on April 1 & in Japan on April 24

item.title: NEJIGANAMETA's Ladies on Top Manga Gets Live-Action Series
item.content:encoded: ONE N' ONLY leader Hayato Takao, <i>Donbrothers'</i> Kohaku Shida star in role-reversal rom-com debuting on March 5
